basics.name: Mustafa KANLI
basics.label: Junior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Full-Stack Developer with a creative edge, devoted to exploring cutting-edge web technologies and harnessing the power of blockchain solutions. Proficient in React, Angular, .NET, Node.js, and Solidity, I specialize in crafting exceptional user experiences and writing clean, efficient code. From dynamic web applications to innovative blockchain projects, I bring versatility to every endeavor. Let's join forces and bring your digital dreams to life!

work.name: Monassist Software
work.summary: Contributed to the development of dynamic web applications, creating seamless interfaces and implementing features for efficient user interaction.
highlights: Maintain web apps with Angular, Nextjs and React.

work.name: Turkish Aerospace
work.summary: Completed a highly successful summer internship, honing skills in React and .Net development while contributing to real-world projects.

work.name: Turkish Aerospace
work.summary: Participated in the prestigious SKY Experience program, gaining hands-on experience in React and Nodejs while working on aerospace-related projects.

projects.name: Etl Project
projects.description: Empowering users to extract, process, and save data from diverse sources using Nextjs. Crafted a captivating promotional website with Tailwind to showcase the application.

projects.name: Product Ownership Inquiry
projects.description: Revolutionizing transparency with a blockchain-based solution for viewing product ownership history. Designed the front-end to seamlessly interact with the Solidity smart contract.

projects.name: Task Management System
projects.description: Pioneered a streamlined system for project and task management at Monassist using Angular. Presented this innovative solution with a robust .Net back-end for Senior Design Project at the university.

projects.name: Event Sharing Platform
projects.description: Empowering communities to share and participate in events through a user-friendly React-based platform.

projects.name: Hotel Reservation Website
projects.description: Devised my inaugural web project - a sophisticated hotel reservation site with a user-friendly interface and efficient Php backend.

volunteer.summary: Led a dynamic team, managed social media accounts and announced organized events for the campus community.
Organized events and provided trainings in the field of computer science.
